about: I live in Colombia, the country of coffee and the countryside, I became interested in programming at the end of the year 2022 and in 2023 I took the decision to throw myself into the world of Web Development, a decision which I do not regret, because I feel that in each new challenge I learn and grow a lot as a person and as a developer, I have met incredible people and studied what I love.
